feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model

entry.title: Addition of custom fields to the relationship of BP transaction
entry.content:
Hi Gurus,

After doing research, I have added one custom field to the structure BUPR_RELSHP_OVR_EXT . I could able to see the newly added field as shown below after adding field to this structure.

When I am trying to edit with the below edit option it is not showing the newly added field to input value into it.

and how to make it editable so that user will enter percentage value and it gets saved in the db table ?

Thanks.

entry.title: Custom Form and Source
entry.content:
I want to create a custom form with a custom data source from Public Cloud.

I already have an ADS ready in BTP and I want to connect the Public Cloud and ADS.

I checked this SAP document to create a communication scenario SAP_COM_0503 but I cannot find it in my system. Turns out that ADS is already integrated in the cloud systems and no longer need communication arrangement (3331902). 

My question is do I just call the render pdf method?

Do I no longer use the BTP ADS service?

How can I assign a custom data source (not a Data Source Extension) to the custom form?

entry.title: UnManaged RAP CDS Odata V4 - JSON array POST method
entry.content:
Hi,

  I have an Unmanaged RAP "Behavior Definition" public on Odatav4 Service Binding:

unmanaged implementation in class <my_class> unique;
strict ( 2 );
define behavior for <my_cds>
lock master
authorization master ( instance )
{
create;
}

In Create Method:

LOOP AT entities ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<fs>).
* my checks
ENDLOOP.

In this example My_Cds have only 2 fields: test (key), description.

POSTMAN test:

When I try to send POST method with JSON Body with single entity work good:

 {
    "test": "001",
     "description": "Hello"
 }
When I try to send array entities like this:
[
   {
     "test": "001",
     "description": "Hello"
   },
   {
      "test": "002",
      "description": "Hello hello"
    }
]
The service response with 400 BadRequest:
 "message": {
            "lang": "en",
            "value": "Error while parsing an XML stream"
        }
 
I don't understand... Is JSON array correct?
On RAP Model, with unmanaged "Behavior Definition", can I send array records in Insert methods or there's a limitation of number of records?
 
Thanks

entry.title: How to use read_to_xml method when the rap is draft
entry.content:
Hi ,  sap  expert

  I am trying to develop  a  Adobe form in ABAP On Cloud (Embedded Steampunk),  i have referred to this blog : 

https://community.sap.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-blog-posts-by-sap/calling-custom-adobe-form-in-abap-on-cloud-embedded-steampunk/ba-p/13585170

 my question is , when  i  call this method DATA(lv_xml) = lo_fdp_util->read_to_xml( it_select = lt_keys ) . the program  will abap dump ,   my rap is use draft  ,  Do I need to do some other job before I can use this method?

 

 

Thank you.

entry.title: RAP - unable to navigate to grand child object page from child page using ODATA V4
entry.content:
Hi,

I have created a RAP application with Parent-child-grandchild relationship. The application navigates correctly from Parent to child but it fails from child to grandchild when using Odata V4 .I tried with Odata V2 and somehow the navigation from child to grandchild works correctly in OData V2 when previewing from ADT.

Based on the suggestion in blog https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/create-root-child-grandchild-great-grandchild-relationship-using-rap/bc-p/14154316#M174482 i tried adding the grandchild page manually in page map in the BAS but it did not resolve the issue and the below error is thrown during the navigation from child to grandchild:

Log-dbg.js:452 2025-07-16 10:43:16.615800 Cannot read properties of undefined (reading '$target') - TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading '$target') TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading '$target') at Object.V [as getVisibleExpression] (FieldTemplating-dbg.js:495:39) at Object.create (Field.metadata-dbg.js:416:37) at PhantomUtil-dbg.js:470:26

Any inputs or suggestions to resolve the issue?

 

Regards

Radhika

entry.title: CL_ABAP_PARALLEL - Fire and forget scenario with an OData implementation/Any object
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I have a usecase where a expensive process have to be pushed in background using CL_ABAP_PARALLEL.
System: S4hana 2022 onpremise
i used run/ run_inst but it waits for all the work process to finish. I could see "START_INST_IN_BACKGROUND" but i am not sure this will server the purpose.

My OData caller is expecting the response immediately and time consuming process should process in background


Note: we are looking for a released api.. clean core journey it is!!!

Regards,
Vishnu

entry.title: Do not display deleted line item in sap adobe form output using SAP S4 using Gateway service
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am using SAP gateway service to develope SAP ADOBE form using the interface i want to omit the deleted line item in form output.

I am following the below steps to produce form output.

1. Create PO with 3 line items and save it.

2. Delete 1 line item from the PO and approve it using the Front End and corresponding output is generated in which i have omited    the deleted line item so the output contains 2 line items.

3. Now i change the PO after apprval and delete another line item this time for the change po i should get only the recently deleted line item in the Change PO output i.e only 2 line items.

Could you please let me know from which table in SAP S4 could i use to add logic.

entry.title: Change PO Delivery address output in SAP Adobe form interface using GW service at Header
entry.content:
Hi All,

I have one requirement to hide Purchase Order Output Header Ship-to Address and display it at line item level only if any line item is having different address from the other line item address.

SAP has provided a note 3025164 - Purchase Order Output Header Ship-to Address  but i need to implement the solution could you please give me input as to where should i make changes and code etc.

i am using SAP GW service to develope the adobe form

Thanks

entry.title: ABAP RAP - Date field value help with future dates disabled?
entry.content:
Hello SAP ABAP RAP Experts,

Is it possible to disable the future dates in the value help of a date field in SAP RAP application?

For example, if today is 22nd July 2025, the value help should show the future dates, i.e. 22nd July onwards as greyed out/disabled and therefore not allowing the user to select future dates.

Just FYI. We are currently handling this requirement based on a validation on save. Is there any other efficient way of handling this?

Thanks!

entry.title: RAP Solution to update Absences (Infotype 2001)
entry.content:
In the context of Clean Core, we have started using RAP for all our API solutions. We have a requirement to update Absences (2001), Presence (2002) and Substitutions (2003). 

Currently known function modules to update Infotypes are "HR_MAINTAIN_MASTERDATA" and "HR_INFOTYPE_OPERATION". 

Unfortunately these function modules are not allowed in RAP since they make use of the statement CALL DIALOG.

Looked into the successor of "HR_MAINTAIN_MASTERDATA", CL_HRPA_MASTERDATA_BL. I do not find enough examples about how to use it for Infotypes 2001/2/3. 

Has anyone tried to work with Absences using RAP?

entry.title: RAP Button action to navigate to external URL
entry.content:
Hi Guys,

We need to add a custom action BUTTON to navigate to an external URL in RAP list report.

Works Using column in list with annotation: type: #WITH_URL , but it's generates an hiperlink and the user wants a button

Question is how to achieve this external navigation on RAP simple as WITH_URL? ( im trying to avoid the creation of this action on frontend and navigation code on JS )

entry.title: Error in Projection CDS View E:SDDL_PARSER_MSG:542 PROVIDER CONTRACT 785
entry.content:
I have developed Root view and on top of which I want to define Projection View, But I encouter error as  E:SDDL_PARSER_MSG:542 PROVIDER CONTRACT 785 , help me to fix this issue. Iam on S4 2020.

@EndUserText.label: 'Projection View for Holiday Block'

@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED

@Metadata.allowExtensions: true

@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true

@Search.searchable: true

define root view entity ZHLD_CUST_BLOCK_C

provider contract transactional_query

as projection on ZHOLIDAY_BLOCK_ROOT

{

key Customer,

key Salorg,

key DistChn,

key Div,

CustomerName1,

CustomerName2,

CustDelBlock,

Text,

StartDate,

EndDate

}

entry.title: MODIFY ENTITIES OF Purchase order item pricing elements (conditions)
entry.content:
Hi Team,

  I have to update the Purchase order item pricing conditions of PMPO and ZDL1 to ZDL4 ( discount level in a bulk through RAP ABAP. I am using this statement by collecting all PO items pricing conditions in  lt_update1 and updating. But this statement is not updating for multiple POs but updates for single PO. Could you please provide your suggestions .
MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_purchaseordertp_2
ENTITY purorderitempricingelement
UPDATE FROM lt_update1
FAILED DATA(ls_failed1)
MAPPED DATA(ls_mapped)
REPORTED DATA(ls_reported1).

Could you please clarify below queries.

1. Please let me know if failed records of all Purchase orders will be collected in 'FAILED DATA'. 

2. Will the successful purchase order update will be rolled back if any one of the purchase order has any errors i,e will we able to update all POs only if there is no error POs?

Thanks & Regards,

Rajeswari

entry.title: Flexible Programming Model show RAP Actions in footer? Is it possible?
entry.content:
Hey dear reader,

I have a FPM App with custom page with XML View and I would like to show the RAP Actions in a footer bar.
Something like a building block for actions.

I am able to show the buttons in the footer from a Fiori Elements Page or standard Object Page from the FPM with the same oData, but in my Custom Page I do not want to re-implement the whole parameter dialogs and call functions, rather then I would re-use this from the RAP framework.

Appreciate any help.

SAPUI5

entry.title: SAP ABAP RAP - Missing value on UI after data created
entry.content:
Dear All,

I encounter an issue where my RAP Application does not return value on UI after created.

The scenario I follow is using /DMO/travel and /DMO/booking (One Travel can have multiple booking)

For example i choose travel number 4136, then i want to create another item booking. I fill the data here then i click save.

After click save, UI not return the data i have just filled, only the price value show up:

 

I am using unmanaged RAP, not sure what is wrong. I do check at Method cba_booking here, this should do the job to return the value to UI.

Appreciate your help and answer.

Thanks.

entry.title: Scalar functions on CDS views
entry.content:
I have created and defined a scalar function called ZWBS_Description.

When implementing the function in the method returnWbsDescription in the corresponding amdp class, the method configuration that provides the result is already set ( in the scalar function definition and implementation reference).

I now would like to create the return value for my scalar function.
(The datasource, is a cds view entity ( based on an SAP table).)

My issue is, that I can't make a select on a CDS view. I get the following error.

In a table function the client dependency can be controlled, but I don't think that is possible for a scalar function. ( The annotation is not allowed. Makes sense, as the client field is always set in a CDS view in the background.)

I have taken a deep dive in the documentation
ABAP CDS - Scalar Functions | ABAP Keyword Documentation
but I can't find any solution regarding that.

My question is now, is it even possible to use a CDS view as a data source?
And on top of that, why (again) are we limited to SQLScript instead if ABAP SQL ?


More background information

entry.title: Possibility for Mass Production Order Confirmation in Foreground from template in SAP Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement, where users perform "Mass Confirmation of production order's" through Excel template. Also, the confirmation screen - CO11N have certain validations (using Badi) in place for the order to be confirmed.

Each order is confirmed in foreground, allowing users to manipulate "Goods movement data - yield Qty, posting date, Storage location, Execution date, Component Qty" to be within validations placed. This is possible in ECC.

Requirement in Public cloud system:

1) User should be able to upload list of Production orders with other info through Template.

2) User should perform confirmation in the foreground with data picked from template and also allowing to change on screen confirmation data.

Has anyone achieved or any possible leads for the same to be replicated in SAP Public Cloud environment?

Thankyou.

entry.title: Dear SAP BTP Trial Support Team,
entry.content:
Dear SAP BTP Trial Support Team/ ABAP TEAM,

I’m currently using the SAP BTP ABAP Environment trial (User ID: GE202076), and I’m facing persistent activation issues with a CDS view.

I’ve followed all RAP and CDS conventions using `define root view entity` based on the recommended replacement entity `I_BUSINESSUSERBASIC`.

However, every attempt to activate the CDS fails with errors like:

- The column BUSINESSUSER is unknown

- The column EMAILADDRESS is unknown

- The column ISLOCKED is unknown

- The column LOGONNAME is unknown

I’ve also tried switching to fields like `firstname`, `lastname`, `emailaddress`, and `businesspartner`, but the activation consistently fails—even in newly created CDS views with correct templates and package setup.

I’ve followed every clean step using Eclipse ADT, project `TDI_EN`, and package `ZGE202076A`, and validated field names via `Ctrl + Space` in the Outline view.

Could you please help me:

  1. Confirm the available fields in `I_BUSINESSUSERBASIC` in my trial tenant 
  2. Identify whether this is a metadata replication/cache issue 
  3. Suggest if another CDS (like `I_EMPLOYEESIMPLE` or similar) should be used instead

Looking forward to your guidance.

Thanks

Best regards, 

**Madhulatha Pelluri**
